page.title: 19ADULT ACTIVITY, STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: THE FOLLOWING ARE SOME OF THE GROUPS IN THE AREA:-{RUGBY CLUB}WHO HAVE A FIELD AT BOLSTERSTONE. {STOCKSBRIDGE {OLD CRICKET CLUB}HAS ITS OWN PITCH AND MEMBERS ALSO COACH YOUNGSTERS.{ {FOOTBALL AND CRICKET}TEAMS FROM BSC PLAY INTERDEPARTMENTAL MATCHES AT THEIR BRACKEN MOOR SITE.{THE SPORTS {CENTRE}CATERS FOR MANY INDOOR ACTIVITIES AS WELL AS SWIMMING. THE MAIN ATTRACTION IS THE INDOOR BOWLING GREEN WHICH ALLOWS THE LOCAL BOWLING CLUB TO PLAY THROUGHOUT THE WINTER.{ {THE VICTORY CLUB}HAS SNOOKER TABLES, A DANCE HALL AND A THEATRE ROOM WITH STAGE. LOCAL GROUPS HOLD EVENTS HERE I.E. CHARITY DANCES, CONCERTS, PLAYS, HOBBIES WEEK AND DINNER DANCES.THERE IS ALSO A HISTORY GROUP, SOCIETIES FOR HISTORY, ART, CAGE BIRDS, CANINE AND GARDENING. THERE ARE ALSO 3 DANCING CLUBS IN THE AREA.
